Member Function Documentation

bool ipl::CSpectral::DeriveCorrelation (  const CStdImage &    Lg,
const CStdImage &    Sm,
CFloatImage &    Dest
)  [static]
 

Correlation using the fast fourier methods FFTForward() and FFTInverse() in this class.

This method takes care of resizing the image dimensions to a power of 2, zeropadding is added as an average of the whole image. Example on using this method: 

                CFloatImage Dest;
                CImage View, z1, z2;
                z1.Load("d:/temp/fnta-abc.bmp");
                z2.Load("d:/temp/a.bmp");
                CSpectral::DeriveCorrelation(z1,z2,Dest);
                // scale the CFloatImage and copy to View image object
                CLocalOperation LO;
                CStatistic Stat;
                Stat.DeriveStats(Dest);
                LO.NonlinearCopyToByte(Dest,10,Stat.GetMin(),Stat.GetMax(),View);
Parameters:
Lg  The large input image to search in.
Sm  The small input image to look for in Lg.
Dest  Resulting correlation result placed in this parameter.
Returns :
False, if one of Lg or Sm is empty.
Version:
0.70
